rules.content: Equipped creature gets +1/+1 and has "When this creature attacks or blocks, you may choose another attacking or blocking creature you control that shares a creature type with it, if you do, this creature gains indestructible until end of turn."
{1}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.

tags.setting: Two exact same body armors on display next to each other.
